name: Therm-a-Rest Trekker Chair
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: Make your gear pull double duty. This kit fits your sleeping pad and transforms it into a backcountry chair. Adjustable straps let you decide how far back you want to recline to watch the stars.Adjustable side straps tune the angle of repose.Elastic sleeves ensures a perfect fit with your sleeping pad.Dimensions are 51 x 107cm for the 20in. size, and 64 x 127cm for the 25in. size.Choose the width that matches your sleeping pad.
